text: The 1978 European Karate Championships, the 13th edition, was held in Geneva, Switzerland from May 19 to 21, 1978. ==Competition== {| |- | Kumite -65 kg | David Coulter | | Damian Gonzalez |- | Kumite -70 kg | Jerome Atkinson | Franco Paganini | Olavi Tuovinen |- | Kumite -75 kg | Christian Gauze | | Gene Dunnett Antonio Martínez Amillo |- | Kumite -80 kg | Sylvain Renaud | Otti Roethoff | Juan Pedro Carbila |- | Kumite + 80 kg | Eugene Codrington | | Massimo Di Luigi |- | Open Kumite | John Reeberg | | |- |} ===Team=== {| |- |- | Kumite | | | |} ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1978 1978 Category:International sports competitions hosted by Switzerland European Karate Championships European championships in 1978 Category:Sport in Geneva Category:Karate competitions in Switzerland Category:20th century in Geneva
title: 1978 European Karate Championships
